Producer: Carolynne Cunningham, Fran Walsh, Peter Jackson, Aimee Peyronnet
Screenwriter: Peter Jackson, Philippa Boyens, Fran Walsh
Rating: PG-13 (Disturbing Violent Images|Disturbing Violent Content|Mature Thematic Material|Some Language)
Synopsis: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon (Saoirse Ronan) watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family (Mark Wahlberg, Rachel Weisz) -- and her killer (Stanley Tucci). As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
Title: The Lovely Bones
